trans-unit.source: Exception occurs when attempting to add a row to a DataTable that has a different number of columns than the table.
trans-unit.target: Exception occurs when attempting to add a row to a DataTable that has a different number of columns than the table.

trans-unit.source: This exception occurs when you attempt to add a row to a dataset that has a different number of columns than the dataset.
trans-unit.target: This exception occurs when you attempt to add a row to a dataset that has a different number of columns than the dataset.

trans-unit.source: You will receive this error if the row that is being added to the dataset has a different number of columns from the input dataset.
trans-unit.target: You will receive this error if the row that is being added to the dataset has a different number of columns from the input dataset.

trans-unit.source: The row cannot be appended to the dataset if the number of columns is different.
trans-unit.target: The row cannot be appended to the dataset if the number of columns is different.

trans-unit.source: Modify the input dataset to have the same number of columns as the row added, or modify the row added to have the same number of columns as the dataset.
trans-unit.target: Modify the input dataset to have the same number of columns as the row added, or modify the row added to have the same number of columns as the dataset.

trans-unit.source: All tables must have the same number of columns.
trans-unit.target: All tables must have the same number of columns.
